attributes.action: Force Sandwell Council to remove parking charges at Sandwell Valley Country Park
attributes.background:
Sandwell Council have introduced parking charges for a local park against the wishes of local residents and despite rising obesity levels and concerns about displaced parking in neighbouring areas.

These charges should be removed and maintenance paid for through existing funding sources.

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is the responsibility of Sandwell Council, not of the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a new petition about this issue with Sandwell Council using the link below:

http://www.sandwell.gov.uk/info/200193/council/417/petitions
